idea-plugin.name: TorqueScript Language Support
idea-plugin.description:
This is an implementation of TorqueScript language support.
It supports a wide range of features, but it is very new and hasn't been exposed to rigorous testing, so there might be a bunch of edge-cases that need taken care of. Please report any you find.

TorqueScript is the proprietary scripting language for the Torque3D Game Engine. Since version 4.0 they are identified by the .tscript extension.

Current features

  • Syntax Highlighting
  • File path detection and hyperlinking
  • Go To Definition for:
    • Global Variables
    • Functions
    • Objects
  • Go To Symbol for:
    • Global Variables
    • Functions
    • Objects
  • Basic Run Configuration
  • Code Completion for:
    • Local Variables
    • Global Variables
    • Global Functions
    • Namespaced Functions
    • Methods
    • Object Names
    • Keywords
    • Builtin functions
    • Builtin classes
    • Callbacks
      • When type analysis succeeds:
      • Method calls on named objects
  • Formatter experimental
  • Brace Matching
  • Commenter
  • Find usages for:
    • Global Variables
    • Local Variables
    • Global Functions
    • Namespaced Functions
    • Object Names
  • Basic Code Folding
  • Navigate to:
    • Functions
    • Global variables
    • Objects
  • Debugger with:
    • Line Breakpoints
    • Step-by-step debugging
    • Run to position
    • On-hover evaluation for simple variables
    • Script stack frame
    • Evaluation menu support
    • Conditional breakpoints
    • Variables and watches
  • Documentation support for:
    • Builtin functions
    • Builtin classes
